post.author: 이진경
post.content:
GTA-Senior Business Systems Analyst

  As a \\"Technical\\" Business Analyst - with experience in the corporate financial services field eg:Asset Management, Investment Banking, you will have an intricate knowledge of these systems and the technology behind them. Your skills and experience allow you the ability to be a resource for our clients to turn to for planning or implementing these business-changing systems.
You will have worked in a tem environment, either as a consultant or a Team Leader.
You will:
*design, analyze, test, debug, document, and implement complex computer applications and/or systems
*assist in developing strategic initiatives to secure new business and maintain existing business
*prepare and maintain system application and user documentation
*interact with end users to define system requirements and provide support to resolve problems or enhance their understanding of systems
*develop documentation supporting the software development process for the assigned product line including requirements documents, software design documents, software test plans, inputs (estimates) to planning activity
*support the Project Manager in meeting the commitments made in the project schedule and suggest work-around solutions where schedule or quality might be compromised
*assist Project Manager in conducting company-wide duties and meeting demands on the development team
Requirements
*Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering
*min 3 years of VB Studio/knowledge of .NET, COM/ATL Libraries in developing object-oriented software designs
*experience with distributed network applications
*familiarity with XML and UML an asset
*4 + years experience working with companies to assist in the implementation of a major CRM, ERP or DM/CMS system
including: PeopleSoft, JDEdwards, and SAP solutions


Additional Information
Salary: CAD 45,000.00 to CAD 60,000.00 per year
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent  

Contact Information
Teresa Sweeney
T_sweeney@ricebrydone.com
KiiA Technology Inc.
553 Richmond Street West
Toronto ON M5V 1Y6
Ph: 416-504-9094
post.title: GTA-Senior Business Systems Analyst
